metadata.Title: CVE-2020-13435 on Ubuntu 20.04 FIPS Compliant (focal) - medium.
metadata.Description:
SQLite through 3.32.0 has a segmentation fault in sqlite3ExprCodeTarget in expr.c.

Update Instructions:

Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2020-13435` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
by updating your system to the following package versions:

lemon - 3.31.1-4ubuntu0.1
libsqlite3-0 - 3.31.1-4ubuntu0.1
libsqlite3-tcl - 3.31.1-4ubuntu0.1
sqlite3 - 3.31.1-4ubuntu0.1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: sqlite3 package in focal was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '3.31.1-4ubuntu0.1').
